text.page:
330
101-165b @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI swA khyA to nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te d+harma d+hA tu ni gardzi ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ye/ ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M dz+nyA nA lo ke/ tri rat+na paM sha saM d+hA ra Ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ a bA yaM dA di a bA yaM dat+te me bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra pa ri pA la ya/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA se na/ ha na ha na/ sarba satwa saM ta na pa ti taM/ kle shA nuts+tshe da ya/ ba ra lak+Sha Na/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ri/ bo d+hi sa twa shi shU pa ti pA la ya/ bud d+hA na de shA ya/ de ba/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/ ga na d+harba/ a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin+na ra/ ma ho ra ga /ba shes+tha pA ya/ a pa yaM dad ti swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi kar yang 'phags

331
101-166a pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sid+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras gtan la phab pa// //
